Excess H-SPM™ material and/or soft folds will affect forming angles. Common care should be used to create minimal folds by removing excess material prior to forming. description: HOLSTEX® thermoform sheet is the most advanced material available for holster and sheath making use. This texture variant is called, "Basket Weave", and features a 3D textured surface that is compatible with the basket weave textures commonly seen on Law Enforcement belts, Police duty gear and other custom leather items. This texture is not to be confused with the current Basket Weave KYDEX® sheet, which is an aftermarket basket weave texture applied to normal KYDEX® sheet stock. Unlike basket weave KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® Basket weave texture is a revolutionary step forward in the available texture options for professional sheath and holster makers. It is available in multiple thicknesses and colors, and is offered in format sizes up to 4’ x 8’ sheets.

The 3D texture on HOLSTEX® Basket Weave is a raised surface texture and does not distort or fade with forming like the aftermarket KYDEX® basket weave texture currently on the market. HOLSTEX® basket weave forms exceptionally well at normal thermoforming temperatures (325ºF - 375ºF). It does not distort at the higher ends of the heating range, and can be easily molded using both press-form and vacuum-forming equipment.
Some images below may show this texture in other colors. Please check the main product image and/or specifications for the the actual color.
We offer custom colors, prints, thicknesses and cuts on all thermoform materials. If you have a special project need, please contact us for assistance and/or details.

This texture is not to be confused with the current Basket Weave KYDEX® sheet, which is an aftermarket basket weave texture applied to normal KYDEX® sheet stock. Unlike basket weave KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® Basket weave texture is a revolutionary step forward in the available texture options for professional sheath and holster makers. It is available in multiple thicknesses and colors, and is offered in format sizes up to 4’ x 8’ sheets.

The 3D texture on HOLSTEX® Basket Weave is a raised surface texture and does not distort or fade with forming like the aftermarket KYDEX® basket weave texture currently on the market. HOLSTEX® basket weave forms exceptionally well at normal thermoforming temperatures (325ºF - 375ºF). It does not distort at the higher ends of the heating range, and can be easily molded using both press-form and vacuum-forming equipment.
Some images below may show this texture in other colors. Please check the main product image and/or specifications for the the actual color.
We offer custom colors, prints, thicknesses and cuts on all thermoform materials. If you have a special project need, please contact us for assistance and/or details.

Unlike basket weave KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® Basket weave texture is a revolutionary step forward in the available texture options for professional sheath and holster makers. It is available in multiple thicknesses and colors, and is offered in format sizes up to 4’ x 8’ sheets.

The 3D texture on HOLSTEX® Basket Weave is a raised surface texture and does not distort or fade with forming like the aftermarket KYDEX® basket weave texture currently on the market. HOLSTEX® basket weave forms exceptionally well at normal thermoforming temperatures (325ºF - 375ºF). It does not distort at the higher ends of the heating range, and can be easily molded using both press-form and vacuum-forming equipment.

description: HOLSTEX® thermoform sheet is the most advanced material available for holster and sheath making use. This texture variant is called, "Basket Weave", and features a 3D textured surface that is compatible with the basket weave textures commonly seen on Law Enforcement belts, Police duty gear and other custom leather items. This texture is not to be confused with the current Basket Weave KYDEX® sheet, which is an aftermarket basket weave texture applied to normal KYDEX® sheet stock. Unlike basket weave KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® Basket weave texture is a revolutionary step forward in the available texture options for professional sheath and holster makers. It is available in multiple thicknesses and colors, and is offered in format sizes up to 4’ x 8’ sheets.

The 3D texture on HOLSTEX® Basket Weave is a raised surface texture and does not distort or fade with forming like the aftermarket KYDEX® basket weave texture currently on the market. HOLSTEX® basket weave forms exceptionally well at normal thermoforming temperatures (325ºF - 375ºF). It does not distort at the higher ends of the heating range, and can be easily molded using both press-form and vacuum-forming equipment.
(This product is sold by the foot.)
Some images below may show this texture in other colors. Please check the main product image and/or specifications for the the actual color.
We offer custom colors, prints, thicknesses and cuts on all thermoform materials. If you have a special project need, please contact us for assistance and/or details.

description: This combo set includes male and female dies for flaring #6 and #8 eyelets, as well as male and female dies for setting Line-20 and Line-24 snaps, all commonly used in knife sheath and gun holster making. These are professional grade and value priced for serious hobbyists.

Our Journeyman Series eyelet flaring combo set is designed to professionally "roll" the unflared side of #6 and #8 holster eyelets by using a small hammer with our die guide. The CKK Journeyman die system is the industry standard for KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® and BOLTARON® eyelet hammer-flaring and is used by professionals who make thousands of holsters and sheaths.

Our Journeyman Series snap setters are designed to professionally affix 2-part Line-20 and Line-24 snaps to leather, cloth, rubber and most other materials. These come as a 2-part male/female system and are heat treated for super long life.
#6 eyelets require a .187 inch hole (3/16) drilled in the thermoplastic sheet or leather for fastening.
#8 eyelets require a .250 inch hole (1/4) drilled in the thermoplastic sheet or leather for fastening.
Included in Journeyman Die Combo Kit
Line-20 Dies = for Line-20 snap sets
Line-24 Dies = for Line-24 snap sets
Die Guide = For holding male/female dies
Die Guide made in the USA at CKK Industries
Pre-rolled eyelets/Pre-set snaps and finished leather straps and holsters shown below are for demo purposes only and are not included in combo die set.

title: Combo Kit - CKK Eyelet/Snap Setting System - (Journeyman Series) | KnifeKits.com
keywords: journeyman kydex eyelet flaring, rivet, line 20, line 24, snaps, flaring, die, KYDEX, sheath, holster, gun, knife, boltaron, holstex, leather

description: HOLSTEX™ is the latest breakthrough in DIY Thermoform Sheet material. It is designed exclusively for small to medium scale heat forming and is a revolutionary step forward for professional sheath and holster makers, as well as amateur mid-professional DIY thermoform artists.
What makes HOLSTEX™ superior to competitive thermoform sheeting?

Excess H-SPM™ material and/or soft folds will affect forming angles. Common care should be used to create minimal folds by removing excess material prior to forming. description: HOLSTEX® thermoform sheet is the most advanced material available for holster and sheath making use. This texture variant is called, "Basket Weave", and features a 3D textured surface that is compatible with the basket weave textures commonly seen on Law Enforcement belts, Police duty gear and other custom leather items. This texture is not to be confused with the current Basket Weave KYDEX® sheet, which is an aftermarket basket weave texture applied to normal KYDEX® sheet stock. Unlike basket weave KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® Basket weave texture is a revolutionary step forward in the available texture options for professional sheath and holster makers. It is available in multiple thicknesses and colors, and is offered in format sizes up to 4’ x 8’ sheets.

The 3D texture on HOLSTEX® Basket Weave is a raised surface texture and does not distort or fade with forming like the aftermarket KYDEX® basket weave texture currently on the market. HOLSTEX® basket weave forms exceptionally well at normal thermoforming temperatures (325ºF - 375ºF). It does not distort at the higher ends of the heating range, and can be easily molded using both press-form and vacuum-forming equipment.
Some images below may show this texture in other colors. Please check the main product image and/or specifications for the the actual color.
We offer custom colors, prints, thicknesses and cuts on all thermoform materials. If you have a special project need, please contact us for assistance and/or details.

description: HOLSTEX® thermoform sheet is the most advanced material available for holster and sheath making use. This texture variant is called, "Basket Weave", and features a 3D textured surface that is compatible with the basket weave textures commonly seen on Law Enforcement belts, Police duty gear and other custom leather items. This texture is not to be confused with the current Basket Weave KYDEX® sheet, which is an aftermarket basket weave texture applied to normal KYDEX® sheet stock. Unlike basket weave KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® Basket weave texture is a revolutionary step forward in the available texture options for professional sheath and holster makers. It is available in multiple thicknesses and colors, and is offered in format sizes up to 4’ x 8’ sheets.

The 3D texture on HOLSTEX® Basket Weave is a raised surface texture and does not distort or fade with forming like the aftermarket KYDEX® basket weave texture currently on the market. HOLSTEX® basket weave forms exceptionally well at normal thermoforming temperatures (325ºF - 375ºF). It does not distort at the higher ends of the heating range, and can be easily molded using both press-form and vacuum-forming equipment.
We offer custom colors, prints, thicknesses and cuts on all thermoform materials. If you have a special project need, please contact us for assistance and/or details.

This texture is not to be confused with the current Basket Weave KYDEX® sheet, which is an aftermarket basket weave texture applied to normal KYDEX® sheet stock. Unlike basket weave KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® Basket weave texture is a revolutionary step forward in the available texture options for professional sheath and holster makers. It is available in multiple thicknesses and colors, and is offered in format sizes up to 4’ x 8’ sheets.

The 3D texture on HOLSTEX® Basket Weave is a raised surface texture and does not distort or fade with forming like the aftermarket KYDEX® basket weave texture currently on the market. HOLSTEX® basket weave forms exceptionally well at normal thermoforming temperatures (325ºF - 375ºF). It does not distort at the higher ends of the heating range, and can be easily molded using both press-form and vacuum-forming equipment.
We offer custom colors, prints, thicknesses and cuts on all thermoform materials. If you have a special project need, please contact us for assistance and/or details.

description: HOLSTEX® thermoform sheet is the most advanced material available for holster and sheath making use. This texture variant is called, "Basket Weave", and features a 3D textured surface that is compatible with the basket weave textures commonly seen on Law Enforcement belts, Police duty gear and other custom leather items. This texture is not to be confused with the current Basket Weave KYDEX® sheet, which is an aftermarket basket weave texture applied to normal KYDEX® sheet stock. Unlike basket weave KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® Basket weave texture is a revolutionary step forward in the available texture options for professional sheath and holster makers. It is available in multiple thicknesses and colors, and is offered in format sizes up to 4’ x 8’ sheets.

The 3D texture on HOLSTEX® Basket Weave is a raised surface texture and does not distort or fade with forming like the aftermarket KYDEX® basket weave texture currently on the market. HOLSTEX® basket weave forms exceptionally well at normal thermoforming temperatures (325ºF - 375ºF). It does not distort at the higher ends of the heating range, and can be easily molded using both press-form and vacuum-forming equipment.
Some images below may show this texture in other colors. Please check the main product image and/or specifications for the the actual color.
We offer custom colors, prints, thicknesses and cuts on all thermoform materials. If you have a special project need, please contact us for assistance and/or details.

description: HOLSTEX™ is the latest breakthrough in DIY Thermoform Sheet material. It is designed exclusively for small to medium scale heat forming and is a revolutionary step forward for professional sheath and holster makers, as well as amateur mid-professional DIY thermoform artists.
What makes HOLSTEX™ superior to competitive thermoform sheeting?

description: HOLSTEX® thermoform sheet is the most advanced material available for holster and sheath making use. This texture variant is called, "Basket Weave", and features a 3D textured surface that is compatible with the basket weave textures commonly seen on Law Enforcement belts, Police duty gear and other custom leather items. This texture is not to be confused with the current Basket Weave KYDEX® sheet, which is an aftermarket basket weave texture applied to normal KYDEX® sheet stock. Unlike basket weave KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® Basket weave texture is a revolutionary step forward in the available texture options for professional sheath and holster makers. It is available in multiple thicknesses and colors, and is offered in format sizes up to 4’ x 8’ sheets.

The 3D texture on HOLSTEX® Basket Weave is a raised surface texture and does not distort or fade with forming like the aftermarket KYDEX® basket weave texture currently on the market. HOLSTEX® basket weave forms exceptionally well at normal thermoforming temperatures (325ºF - 375ºF). It does not distort at the higher ends of the heating range, and can be easily molded using both press-form and vacuum-forming equipment.
Some images below may show this texture in other colors. Please check the main product image and/or specifications for the the actual color.
We offer custom colors, prints, thicknesses and cuts on all thermoform materials. If you have a special project need, please contact us for assistance and/or details.

This texture is not to be confused with the current Basket Weave KYDEX® sheet, which is an aftermarket basket weave texture applied to normal KYDEX® sheet stock. Unlike basket weave KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® Basket weave texture is a revolutionary step forward in the available texture options for professional sheath and holster makers. It is available in multiple thicknesses and colors, and is offered in format sizes up to 4’ x 8’ sheets.

The 3D texture on HOLSTEX® Basket Weave is a raised surface texture and does not distort or fade with forming like the aftermarket KYDEX® basket weave texture currently on the market. HOLSTEX® basket weave forms exceptionally well at normal thermoforming temperatures (325ºF - 375ºF). It does not distort at the higher ends of the heating range, and can be easily molded using both press-form and vacuum-forming equipment.
Some images below may show this texture in other colors. Please check the main product image and/or specifications for the the actual color.
We offer custom colors, prints, thicknesses and cuts on all thermoform materials. If you have a special project need, please contact us for assistance and/or details.

description: HOLSTEX® thermoform sheet is the most advanced material available for holster and sheath making use. This texture variant is called, "Basket Weave", and features a 3D textured surface that is compatible with the basket weave textures commonly seen on Law Enforcement belts, Police duty gear and other custom leather items. This texture is not to be confused with the current Basket Weave KYDEX® sheet, which is an aftermarket basket weave texture applied to normal KYDEX® sheet stock. Unlike basket weave KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® Basket weave texture is a revolutionary step forward in the available texture options for professional sheath and holster makers. It is available in multiple thicknesses and colors, and is offered in format sizes up to 4’ x 8’ sheets.

The 3D texture on HOLSTEX® Basket Weave is a raised surface texture and does not distort or fade with forming like the aftermarket KYDEX® basket weave texture currently on the market. HOLSTEX® basket weave forms exceptionally well at normal thermoforming temperatures (325ºF - 375ºF). It does not distort at the higher ends of the heating range, and can be easily molded using both press-form and vacuum-forming equipment.
Some images below may show this texture in other colors. Please check the main product image and/or specifications for the the actual color.
We offer custom colors, prints, thicknesses and cuts on all thermoform materials. If you have a special project need, please contact us for assistance and/or details.

description: HOLSTEX® thermoform sheet is the most advanced material available for holster and sheath making use. This texture variant is called, "Basket Weave", and features a 3D textured surface that is compatible with the basket weave textures commonly seen on Law Enforcement belts, Police duty gear and other custom leather items. This texture is not to be confused with the current Basket Weave KYDEX® sheet, which is an aftermarket basket weave texture applied to normal KYDEX® sheet stock. Unlike basket weave KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® Basket weave texture is a revolutionary step forward in the available texture options for professional sheath and holster makers. It is available in multiple thicknesses and colors, and is offered in format sizes up to 4’ x 8’ sheets.

The 3D texture on HOLSTEX® Basket Weave is a raised surface texture and does not distort or fade with forming like the aftermarket KYDEX® basket weave texture currently on the market. HOLSTEX® basket weave forms exceptionally well at normal thermoforming temperatures (325ºF - 375ºF). It does not distort at the higher ends of the heating range, and can be easily molded using both press-form and vacuum-forming equipment.

description: HOLSTEX® thermoform sheet is the most advanced material available for holster and sheath making use. This texture variant is called, "Basket Weave", and features a 3D textured surface that is compatible with the basket weave textures commonly seen on Law Enforcement belts, Police duty gear and other custom leather items. This texture is not to be confused with the current Basket Weave KYDEX® sheet, which is an aftermarket basket weave texture applied to normal KYDEX® sheet stock. Unlike basket weave KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® Basket weave texture is a revolutionary step forward in the available texture options for professional sheath and holster makers. It is available in multiple thicknesses and colors, and is offered in format sizes up to 4’ x 8’ sheets.

The 3D texture on HOLSTEX® Basket Weave is a raised surface texture and does not distort or fade with forming like the aftermarket KYDEX® basket weave texture currently on the market. HOLSTEX® basket weave forms exceptionally well at normal thermoforming temperatures (325ºF - 375ºF). It does not distort at the higher ends of the heating range, and can be easily molded using both press-form and vacuum-forming equipment.
Some images below may show this texture in other colors. Please check the main product image and/or specifications for the the actual color.
We offer custom colors, prints, thicknesses and cuts on all thermoform materials. If you have a special project need, please contact us for assistance and/or details.

Unlike basket weave KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® Basket weave texture is a revolutionary step forward in the available texture options for professional sheath and holster makers. It is available in multiple thicknesses and colors, and is offered in format sizes up to 4’ x 8’ sheets.

The 3D texture on HOLSTEX® Basket Weave is a raised surface texture and does not distort or fade with forming like the aftermarket KYDEX® basket weave texture currently on the market. HOLSTEX® basket weave forms exceptionally well at normal thermoforming temperatures (325ºF - 375ºF). It does not distort at the higher ends of the heating range, and can be easily molded using both press-form and vacuum-forming equipment.

description: HOLSTEX® thermoform sheet is the most advanced material available for holster and sheath making use. This texture variant is called, "Basket Weave", and features a 3D textured surface that is compatible with the basket weave textures commonly seen on Law Enforcement belts, Police duty gear and other custom leather items. This texture is not to be confused with the current Basket Weave KYDEX® sheet, which is an aftermarket basket weave texture applied to normal KYDEX® sheet stock. Unlike basket weave KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® Basket weave texture is a revolutionary step forward in the available texture options for professional sheath and holster makers. It is available in multiple thicknesses and colors, and is offered in format sizes up to 4’ x 8’ sheets.

The 3D texture on HOLSTEX® Basket Weave is a raised surface texture and does not distort or fade with forming like the aftermarket KYDEX® basket weave texture currently on the market. HOLSTEX® basket weave forms exceptionally well at normal thermoforming temperatures (325ºF - 375ºF). It does not distort at the higher ends of the heating range, and can be easily molded using both press-form and vacuum-forming equipment.
